metadata.synopsis: Cinematic arena dialog to destroy a statue.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go under S_GoblinPriestess_Statue_01_dc68d2e5-b526-424b-ad9a-316238a75f65 in WLD_Main_A, Start combat against S_GOB_GoblinPriest_b983c336-9a14-4e9b-adb9-4689e7e0afa9, in her turn, if a player character is alone under any of the statues, this dialog will be triggered.
